title: California scheming
description:
Republicans primed their voters to believe the California recall was stolen. And right-wing media helped them. Vox’s Aaron Rupar explains. Read Aaron’s story here. 

Enjoyed this episode? Rate Recode Daily ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ and leave a review on Apple Podcasts.

itunes:title: California scheming
itunes:author: Recode
itunes:subtitle: As Gavin Newsom’s victory became more certain, the GOP pivoted to baseless claims of election fraud.
